updateData.data:
Here the messenger is used to do an iterative calculation.

The table "nFactorial" is equal to "n" times "nMinus1Factorial". However
the formual for the table nFactorial also requests that the tables "n" and 
"nMinus1Factorial" be updated, such that the calculation can go to the next 
iteration.

Note that when a request is made for the messenger to update a table, this
request is not carried out until after the current calculation is finished.

When the remote tables are updated, it can be seen as starting a completely new 
calculation.
